review: This guitar strap is wide and well made of good quality leather.Just what I needed.I am very happy with it and thank you. Rich B.
Heavy construction in layered leather.There is no pressure on the shoulder and it is very expensive looking.I will buy another in a second color.
Strong and won't tip.price is very affordable.I own several and have had no trouble with them.Buy it and you will see.
Not a flashy strap but great in the studio or on stage when you need to change guitars fast.Light weight allows you to remove quickly.It is pretty comfortable to wear also.
I had no reference point to judge the size of these picks perhaps compare pick with a quarter in the shot as a sizing method.Good picks though.
